item.description:
Jillian 10 pin (big balls) bowling and shoe rentals for up to 40 people from 6-8pm (Event Part 1) and then billiards (pool) for up to 25 guests from 8-10pm (Event Part 2).

I made the RSVP higher since I know we will get no shows and last minute drop outs for the both.

Also, included areÂ complimentary appetizers of chips and salsa and complimentary bowling shoe rentals too. Please show up on time or early as we have to pick teams and start bowling with or without you. Please make sure to bring socks for bowling.

I am making this 2 separate events so PLEASE be sure to sign up for each separately.

Also, I am asking all members that do attend either of these 2 events to please chip in $5 (Only pay $5 even if you go to both events) since this is a event that is worth over $30 a person.

Thank You

Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: Meet for bowling at Jillian's 3rd floor (which is called Lucky Strike ) and ask for Biagio Social Fun Meetup
item.name: Jillian's (10 pin) bowling from 6-8pm (Event Part 1)
